data.title: Velora
data.logoAlt: Minimalist and modern logo featuring a 3D hexagonal design with layered geometric shapes in shades of blue and gray, creating a sense of depth and innovation. The logo is set against a clean, light background, emphasizing its sleek and futuristic appearance.
data.description: Landing page to discover Velora, the future of manufacturing powered by the latest technology.

data.title: Vaultflow
data.logoAlt: Vaultflow logo, a V with a keyhole in the middle
data.description: Landing page for Vaultflow  a new way to manage your company's finances.

data.title: ApiMill V3
data.logoAlt: Sphere like web sphere with the text: Génération de brochures Apidae
data.description: Actually on working on the third version of the ApiMill project, Saas brochure generation tool for the Apidae platform in my web agency.

data.title: Get Afraid
data.logoAlt: Chalk writin  like satanist symbols with old effect like a horror movie/story
data.description: Progressive web app for horror stories generation only by artificial intelligence, with a dark and mysterious design. (backend in maintenance)

data.title: Portfolio v2
data.logoAlt: Purple capital letters N & P with a dot at left bottom
data.description: Your are currently on the second version of my portfolio, a showcase of my skills and projects. Astro static website built with a lot of love.

data.title: Real Estate admin panel
data.logoAlt: 3D house with a roof and a chimney, with a tree and a sun
data.description: I made an admin panel for a real estate agency in my web agency. It's a tool to manage real estate adverts
